short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy websites to Webflow, framer & Wordpress(elementor, droip, bricks)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Htflow HTML CSS Extractor is a powerful Chrome extension designed for web developers, designers, and enthusiasts who need a quick and efficient way to extract HTML and CSS from any webpage. With just one click, this tool simplifies the process of analyzing and extracting specific code segments, making it incredibly easy to reuse, study, or modify existing web designs.

Free Use: HTML and CSS code extraction is available at no cost for integration into various web projects, including React applications and HTML websites.

Paid Use: To utilize the extracted HTML and CSS code as a Webflow component, a monthly subscription plan is required.

Key Features:

One-Click Extraction: 
Instantly pull HTML and CSS directly from web pages without the need for complex setups or additional tools.

User-Friendly Interface: 
Designed with simplicity in mind, our intuitive interface makes it accessible to both beginners and experienced developers.

Efficient Code Analysis: 
Quickly identify and extract the exact piece of code you need, saving you time and effort in your web development projects.

Seamless Integration: 
Works quietly in the background with minimal impact on browsing performance, ready when you need it.

HTML to Page Builder (Webflow, Framer, Elementor, Droip, Bricks Builder): (Paid plan)
You can seamlessly convert the extracted code into webflow, framer, elementor, droip and bricks builder.

Emmet Shorthand to Webflow: (Paid plan)
Utilize Emmet shorthand to swiftly generate custom markup, which can be seamlessly converted into Webflow components with a single click. This feature allows for rapid creation of extensive layouts in Webflow, significantly reducing development time.



Ideal for:

Web developers looking to streamline their development workflow.
Designers seeking inspiration or wanting to analyze webpage layouts.
Educators and students in web development courses.
Content creators needing to extract and discuss specific web designs.

Get Started Now:

Install "Htflow HTML CSS Extractor" today to enhance your productivity and gain deeper insights into the building blocks of modern web pages! 

Note: We are committed to continuously enhancing this extension to provide a better user experience.
